# Copilot Instructions for rizzosai Affiliate Flask Backend

- [ ] Project scaffolded as Flask backend for affiliate site (rizzosai) with CORS, static guide downloads, requirements.txt, .env example, and README.
- [ ] Guides: TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Cheap Traffic.
- [ ] Deployment-ready for Render.

Work through the checklist in this file as you build and deploy the project.
